Articles.Content:
Lately i have become a Kerbal Space Program junkie, and i am here for group therapy

So my name is John and since my first KSP launch a couple of months ago all i can think of is orbits and Delta-Vs

Heya javaj (aka John).

Welcome to the forms!

You have come to the right place. There is a group that meets called "Kerbaholics Anonymous." All we ask is that you stand up an introduce yourself. (Which I think you just did. You're standing right?)

Anyway, enjoy your stay!

~Claw
